snippet: In Tuesday's New York Times, Martha Schwendener reviews the VIP Art Fair 2.0, the Internet's first major art bazaar. It's 2.0 because this is the second year for the fair. Last year, it had all sorts of technical problems, but this year they seem to...
abstract: In Tuesday's New York Times, Martha Schwendener reviews the VIP Art Fair 2.0, the Internet's first major art bazaar. It's 2.0 because this is the second year for the fair. Last year, it had all sorts of technical problems, but this year they seem to have been smoothed out.
lead_paragraph: In Tuesday's New York Times, Martha Schwendener reviews the VIP Art Fair 2.0, the Internet's first major art bazaar. It's 2.0 because this is the second year for the fair. Last year, it had all sorts of technical problems, but this year they seem to have been smoothed out.

headline.main: Daily Report: An Internet Art Fair
